title: Pixel 5 with IPS screen really NEED
content:
How to ask Pixel's team to make Pixel phone with IPS ?
I like the design and performance and camera. But Really my eyes doesnt feel comfortable with OLED. Need IPS thou. How can I contact Pixel's team to make this request
- Chat
- Email
etc ?

This request is POPULAR. About 30% of users would use IPS.
Here is popular youtuber talks that he would prefer IPS in Pixel too:
https://youtu.be/ZU1QyX8KdyM?t=353

---

If you have Pixel - please send url to this topic to Pixel's team. Here is the guide how
https://support.google.com/pixelphone/answer/6398243?hl=en&ref_topic=7084203

send to them this topic's URL:
https://support.google.com/pixelphone/thread/72081311?hl=en

Thank you!
